name: Crowdata
tagline: Easily crowdsource the analysis of your documents
body:
_CrowData is a tool to collaborate on the verification or release of data that otherwise would be hard or impossible to get via automatic tools._

## Where is used?

[VozData](http://vozdata.lanacion.com.ar) is a website from [La Nacion](http://www.lanacion.com.ar) in Argentina to convert scanned PDF documents from senate spending into an usable data set.

## Installation and configuration

Work in Progress at [Crowdata Docs](http://crowdata.readthedocs.org/en/latest/).

## Related projects

* [Free the Files](http://www.propublica.org/series/free-the-files)
* [Yanukovych Leaks](http://www.yanukovychleaks.org/detail/23570/)
